page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {Families}vary in size from single parents with one child to large extended families.Most{houses}are small(not more than four bedrooms,some only one).Usually each child has its own bedroom.The houses have gardens; flats have a play area nearby.Every home has a {bathroom,a television,}a variety of {domestic appliances }and books.Most families have a {telephone} and at least one{car}.Some have { {computers}and audio equipment - many have pets.Most children are well fed and parental care is given to their{ {health,hygiene}and {education}(e.g. private Music lessons).The family seems to gather and converse at breakfast,children lunching at school and parents at work(most mothers have jobs).Although few practise religion, Christmas is generally a family gathering as are birthdays etc..
